name: remarriage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or occasion of marrying again, or the state of being married again: Her father's remarriage meant that she now had a stepmother. Less than a year passed between her divorce and her re-marriage. Remarriages do not generally last as long as first marriages. Related word
marriage
More examplesFewer examplesHe was astonished by his mother's sudden remarriage.The remarriage rate for divorced women is extremely high.After her remarriage, she moved with her family from London to New York.He was rarely out of the headlines that summer on account of his drunken antics and his re-marriage to his ex-wife.
